body_html: Noting for completeness that I am running on a GeForce GTX 670 (2GB) and that avg(avg(x_i)) = avg(x_i) when |x_i| for all i is equal. Also, new to python and realizing that for _ in range(...) is more pythonic, so happy to make that change if requested.
body_text: Noting for completeness that I am running on a GeForce GTX 670 (2GB) and that avg(avg(x_i)) = avg(x_i) when |x_i| for all i is equal. Also, new to python and realizing that for _ in range(...) is more pythonic, so happy to make that change if requested.
body: Noting for completeness that I am running on a GeForce GTX 670 (2GB) and that avg(avg(x_i)) = avg(x_i) when |x_i| for all i is equal. Also, new to python and realizing that for _ in range(...) is more pythonic, so happy to make that change if requested.
